title: New: The Delphines – God Help The Delphines EP
content:
Milwaukee’s The Delphines are one of my favourite underground acts of the year; disastrously underrated, yet part of me quite enjoys having them as my own little secret.

Their new EP titled God Help The Delphines is ten minutes of whiskey soaked, weed-addled 60’s pop, following on from the release of their fantastic single Panic. Take the terrifyingly upbeat ’71, that’s part Beach Boys, part Best Coast and 100% awesome. It’s not until the final track on the EP, the sombre Half of a Century, that they take their foot off the gas, slowing things down to a sultry, percussion heavy walk, whilst maintaing their rhythmic swagger. Check out the full EP now, and grab a pay-what-you-like download. Trust me, it’s worth it.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
